name: day28-banner-and-category-module
description: - Copying brand modules and pasting in modules - Tespachi hami lea tyo copy modules lai banner name diye. - Aani banner.model ma naam diye pachi tesko bhira ko code ma k k chaini ra k k nachaini dbdiagram bata herera modify garchau - Anni tespachi saab file haru ma brand ko satta banner vanera lekhchau. - Tespachi banner.router, banner.controller ra banner.service file ma pani tesari nai code milaunchau.
